description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for Jobnik SDK - worker, consumer, producer, and system metrics

panels.description: SDK version and runtime information
panels.title: SDK Version

panels.description: Time since worker started processing tasks
panels.title: Worker Uptime

panels.description: Current number of tasks being actively processed
panels.title: Active Tasks

panels.description: Total tasks completed successfully
panels.title: Tasks Completed

panels.description: Task success rate: completed / (completed + failed)
panels.title: Task Success Rate

panels.description: Task processing duration distribution by stage type
panels.title: Task Duration Percentiles

panels.description: Rate of tasks completed vs failed over time (tasks per minute for better readability)
panels.title: Task Processing Rate (Tasks/min)

panels.description: Circuit breaker state: 0=closed (healthy), 1=half_open (testing), 2=open (failing)
panels.title: Circuit Breaker Status

panels.description: Total times circuit breakers have opened (indicates failures)
panels.title: Circuit Breaker Opens (Total)

panels.description: Consecutive polls that returned no tasks - indicates queue health
panels.title: Consecutive Empty Polls (Queue Health)

panels.description: Time taken to dequeue tasks from the API by status
panels.title: Dequeue Duration Percentiles

panels.description: Time taken to update task status via the API
panels.title: Task Update Duration Percentiles

panels.description: Task update success vs error rate
panels.title: Task Update Operations (Success vs Error)

panels.description: Total producer operations by type (create_job, create_stage, create_tasks)
panels.title: Producer Operations Total

panels.description: Time taken to create jobs via the API
panels.title: Job Creation Duration

panels.description: Time taken to create stages via the API
panels.title: Stage Creation Duration

panels.description: Time taken to create tasks via the API
panels.title: Task Creation Duration

panels.description: HTTP request duration percentiles by method
panels.title: HTTP Request Duration by Method

panels.description: HTTP request rate by method and status code
panels.title: HTTP Request Rate (by method & status)

panels.description: HTTP request body size distribution
panels.title: HTTP Request Size Distribution

panels.description: Total HTTP retry attempts by method and reason
panels.title: HTTP Retries Total

panels.description: CPU usage (user + system time)
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory usage (resident and heap)
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Event loop lag - critical for Node.js performance
panels.title: Event Loop Lag

panels.description: Garbage collection duration by type
panels.title: Garbage Collection Duration

panels.description: Open file descriptors vs maximum
panels.title: File Descriptors

title: Jobnik SDK - Performance & Operations
